committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: To amend the Price-Anderson provisions of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to increase the accountability of certain contractors, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Energy Nuclear Facilities Safety Act of 1989

summary.text: Department of Energy Nuclear Facilities Safety Act of 1989 - Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to repeal: (1) the authority of the Secretary of Energy to grant nonprofit educational institutions automatic remissions of civil monetary penalties for violations of Department of Energy regulations; and (2) the exemptions granted to specified research institutes from such penalties. Increases the monetary fines and imprisonment terms for persons indemnified under an indemnification agreement who knowingly violate the Act's safety rules.

titles.title: Department of Energy Nuclear Facilities Safety Act of 1989
To amend the Price-Anderson provisions of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to increase the accountability of certain contractors, and for other purposes.
